fmpirate

Class PlaylistManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fmpirate.PlaylistManager

  • public final class PlaylistManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the play, stop, and shuffle logic to the ControllerGUI. It manages the Process playlistProcess which effectively executes bash to initialize broadcast and kill SoX processes as needed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlaylistManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static java.lang.String getPath() 
      protected static void play()
      Attempts to bash-execute the playlist file specified by tempPath using playlistProcess.
      protected static void play(java.lang.String playListPath)
      Sets the content of tempPath to the string passed and calls play() to attempt to bash-execute the playlist file specified by tempPath using playlistProcess.
      protected static void shuffle(java.lang.String filePath, java.lang.String newFrequency)
      Reads a bash-executable playlist and replaces the frequency in each line with the new frequency passed to the method and stores each non-blank line to the String ArrayList, playList.
      protected static void stop()
      Attempts to destroy the current playlistProcess and attempts to then kill SoX (which will otherwise continue to run) using playlistProcess.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • PlaylistManager

        public PlaylistManager()

    • Method Detail

      • play

        protected static void play(java.lang.String playListPath)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the content of tempPath to the string passed and calls play() to attempt to bash-execute the playlist file specified by tempPath using playlistProcess.
        Parameters:
        playListPath - The path of the playlist to be executed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • play

        protected static void play()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Attempts to bash-execute the playlist file specified by tempPath using playlistProcess.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • stop

        protected static void stop()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Attempts to destroy the current playlistProcess and attempts to then kill SoX (which will otherwise continue to run) using playlistProcess.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • shuffle

        protected static void shuffle(java.lang.String filePath,
                              java.lang.String newFrequency)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a bash-executable playlist and replaces the frequency in each line with the new frequency passed to the method and stores each non-blank line to the String ArrayList, playList. Finally, createTempFile is called to make use of the ArrayList contents.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to a bash script in "../.temp_files"
        newFrequency - The frequency which was captured from the JSliders in ControllerGUI.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getPath

        protected static java.lang.String getPath()
